Zvezda zove navijače na Totenhem, uz podsećanje na važan datum
03 Nov 2019, 16:06 by Milos
Crvena zvezda dočekuje Totenhem u utakmici četvrtog kola B grupe Lige šampiona. Susret na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“ na programu je u sredu, 6. novembra od 21 sat.
Crveno-beli su podsetili navijače da još uvek ima karata u slobodnoj prodaji za ovaj meč. Takođe, Zvezdu veže lepo sećanje na 6. novembar 2018. godine, kada je u Beogradu pao Liverpul.
– Podsećamo sve navijače crveno-belih da se ulaznice za meč protiv Totenhema nalaze u prodaji. Svi oni koji još uvek nisu obezbedili vredno parče papira mogu to da urade do početka utakmice u sredu, koja je po mnogo tome slična prošlogodišnjem susretu sa Liverpulom.
Šestog novembra prošle godine odigrana je jedna od najvećih utakmica Crvene zvezde od osvajanja evropske i svetske titule iz 1991. godine. Sve je bilo spremno za spektakl protiv tadašnjeg vicešampiona Evrope. Nije se očekivalo mnogo od ekipe Vladana Milojevića budući na rezultat u Engleskoj. A onda se desilo nešto što i najvatreniji navijači crveno-belih nisu mogli da predvide. Milan Pavkov za svega sedam minuta postiže dva pogotka i ostavlja u neverici stručni štab Liverpula. Erupcija oduševljenja na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“ nije se smirivala sve do samog kraja utakmice, igrači su ispraćeni kao heroji.
Godinu dana kasnije pred utakmicu četvrtog kola grupne faze Lige šampiona crveno-beli nalaze se u sličnoj situaciji. Ovoga puta naši igrači poraženi su od Totenhema, takođe engleskog kluba i finaliste Lige šampiona. Rezultat iz Londona se malo razlikuje od prošlogodišnjeg duela sa Liverpulom. Situacija koja neodoljivo podseća na scenario iz prošle godine, ovog puta naše momke očekuje još jedan meč sa Totenhemom.
Datum odigravanja nije jedino što spaja ove dve utakmice. Kao i prethodne godine naše igrače očekuje duel sa aktuelnim finalistom Lige šampiona. Međutim to nisu jedini znakovi koji ukazuju da bi scenario mogao da se ponovi. Crvena zvezda imala je prošle godine identičan put kao i sad. Izabranicima Vladana Milojevića generalna proba pred duel protiv engleskog tima bila je ekipa Proletera. Godinu dana kasnije istorija se ponavlja. Crveno beli prošle sezone savladali su tim iz Novog Sada rezultatom 2:0, ovog puta utakmica je završena pobedom naše ekipe od 2:1.
Pokazali su karakter i kvalitet izabranici Vladana Milojevića u momentu kada niko nije verovao u njih. Izdigli su se iz situacije i dokazali da su spremni da pobede i budućeg osvajača Lige šampiona. Verujemo da će naši igrači odreagovati isto kao i u prethodnoj sezoni i još jednom pokazati da nisu ekipa koju treba potcenjivati. Na krilima zvezdaša, crveno-beli će pokušati da ostvare veliku pobedu i dočekaju proleće u Evropi, a na nama je da još jednom napravimo fenomenalnu atmosferu na stadionu “Rajko Mitić”. Zvezda te zove!, stoji na sajtu FK Crvena zvezda.

The star calls fans to Tottenham, with a reminder of an important date
03 Nov 2019, 15:06 by Milos
The Red Star welcomes Tottenham to the Champions League Group B Group Four. The meeting at the stadium "Rajko Mitic" is on the program on Wednesday, November 6 from 9 pm.
The red and whites reminded fans that there were still tickets available for free this match. Also, the Star has a fond memory of November 6, 2018, when Liverpool fell in Belgrade.
- We remind all red and white fans that tickets for the match against Tottenham are on sale. All those who have not yet provided a valuable piece of paper can do so by the start of Wednesday's game, which is in many ways similar to last year's meeting with Liverpool.
On November 6 last year, one of the biggest Red Star matches was played since winning the 1991 European and World titles. Everything was ready for the spectacle against the then vice-champion of Europe. Not much was expected of Vladan Milojevic's team since the result in England. And then something happened that even the most ardent red-and-white fans couldn't predict. Milan Pavkov scores two goals in just seven minutes and leaves Liverpool's headquarters in disbelief. The eruption of enthusiasm at the Rajko Mitic stadium did not calm down until the very end of the game, the players were seen as heroes.
A year later, before the fourth round of the Champions League group stage, the Red and White are in a similar situation. This time our players were defeated by Tottenham, also an English club and a Champions League finalist. The result from London is a little different from last year's duel with Liverpool. A situation that is irresistibly reminiscent of a scenario from last year, this time our boys expect another match with Tottenham.
A play date is not the only thing that combines these two games. As in the previous year, our players expect a duel with the current Champions League finalist. However, these are not the only signs that indicate that the scenario could be repeated. The Red Star had the same path last year as it does now. Vladan Milojevic was selected by the Proleter team for the general rehearsal of the duel against the English team. A year later history repeats itself. The Reds beat the team from Novi Sad last season 2-0, this time the game ended with our team winning 2: 1.
They showed the character and quality of Vladan Milojevic's elect at a time when no one believed in them. They have risen from the situation and proved that they are ready to defeat the future Champions League champion as well. We believe that our players will respond the same as in the previous season and show once again that they are not a team to be underestimated. On the wings of the stars, the red and whites will try to achieve a big win and welcome spring in Europe, and it is up to us to create a phenomenal atmosphere at the Rajko Mitic Stadium once again. The Star is Calling You !, according to the FC Red Star website.
